home.title: ShopHub - Premium Products at Great Prices
home.description: Shop the latest trends in electronics, fashion, and home goods. Free shipping on orders over $50.

hero.title: Discover the Best Deals in Electronics, Fashion & More!
hero.subtitle: Shop your favorite products at unbeatable prices.

login.title: Login - ShopHub
login.description: Sign in to your ShopHub account

cart.title: Shopping Cart - ShopHub
cart.description: Review your shopping cart and proceed to checkout

order.successDescription: Your order has been placed successfully
order.thankYou: Thank you for shopping with ShopHub. Your order is being processed.
order.confirmedDescription: Your order has been successfully placed. Track your delivery and manage your purchase.
order.failedDescription: There was an issue processing your order
order.trackingDescription: Track your ShopHub order in real-time. Enter your order ID and email to see current status and delivery updates.

payment.successDescription: Your payment has been processed successfully
payment.failedDescription: Payment processing failed. Please try again or contact support.

profile.title: My Profile - ShopHub
profile.description: Manage your account, view orders, and update your profile

wishlist.title: My Wishlist - ShopHub
wishlist.description: View and manage your saved products

compare.title: Compare Products - ShopHub
compare.description: Compare products side by side to make the best choice

company.title: Company - ShopHub
company.description: Learn about ShopHub's mission, values, careers, and commitment to sustainability. Join our team and discover our story.

careers.title: Careers - ShopHub
careers.description: Join the ShopHub team and be part of shaping the future of e-commerce. Explore career opportunities and our company culture.

contact.title: Contact Us - ShopHub
contact.description: Get in touch with ShopHub customer support. We're here to help with any questions or concerns.

customerService.title: Customer Service - ShopHub
customerService.description: Get help with orders, returns, shipping, and more. We're here to help you 24/7.

faq.title: FAQ - ShopHub
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about shipping, returns, payments, and more

helpCenter.title: Help Center - ShopHub
helpCenter.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about orders, shipping, returns, and more. Get help with your ShopHub experience.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery - ShopHub
shipping.description: Learn about our shipping policies, delivery options, and international shipping services.

returns.title: Returns & Exchanges - ShopHub
returns.description: Easy returns, fast refunds, and simple exchanges. Return items within 14 days for a full refund or exchange.

returnPolicy.title: Return Policy - ShopHub
returnPolicy.description: Learn about our return policy, eligibility requirements, and conditions for returning items.

exchangePolicy.title: Exchange Policy - ShopHub
exchangePolicy.description: Learn about our exchange policy for sizes, colors, and products. Exchange items within 14 days of delivery.

howToReturn.title: How to Return - ShopHub
howToReturn.description: Step-by-step guide to return items. Learn how to initiate returns, package items, and schedule pickup.

refundProcess.title: Refund Process - ShopHub
refundProcess.description: Learn about our refund processing timeline and methods. Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days.

sustainability.title: Sustainability - ShopHub
sustainability.description: ShopHub's commitment to sustainability, environmental initiatives, and responsible business practices.
sustainability.commitment: At ShopHub, sustainability is not just a buzzword‚Äîit's a core part of our mission.

pressMedia.title: Press & Media - ShopHub
pressMedia.description: ShopHub press releases, media resources, and brand assets for journalists and media professionals.

accountSettings.title: Account Settings - ShopHub
accountSettings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

reportIssue.title: Report an Issue - ShopHub
reportIssue.description: Report damaged, missing, or incorrect items. Submit a support ticket for order issues and get help from our customer service team.

faqQuestions.shippingAnswer: Shipping costs depend on your location, order weight, and shipping method. Free shipping is available on orders over $50.
